original_text: And Joshua set up twelve stones in the midst of Jordan, in the place where the feet of the priests which bare the ark of the covenant stood: and they are there unto this day.
korean_text: 여호수아가 또 요단 가운데 곧 언약궤를 멘 제사장들의 발이 선 곳에 돌 열둘을 세웠더니 오늘까지 거기에 있더라

sentences.original_text: And Joshua set up twelve stones
in the place where the feet of the priests
which bare the ark of the covenant stood
sentences.korean_translation: 언약궤를 멘 제사장들이 서 있던 곳에
